name: Surry Hills Studio - Your Perfect Base in Sydney
summary: This spacious, light filled studio has everything you need to enjoy Sydney and is the perfect base for exploring. The harbour is an easy walk, Bondi a short bus trip away.
space: Comfortable studio with a great layout. The bathroom has a full size bath tub and shower. Complete set of kitchen utensils etc for cooking and a full size fridge. The 3 seater sofa and 42' TV mean you can comfortably relax after a day at the beach or exploring.  Large lounge room windows provide harbour views.
description: This spacious, light filled studio has everything you need to enjoy Sydney and is the perfect base for exploring. The harbour is an easy walk, Bondi a short bus trip away. Comfortable studio with a great layout. The bathroom has a full size bath tub and shower. Complete set of kitchen utensils etc for cooking and a full size fridge. The 3 seater sofa and 42' TV mean you can comfortably relax after a day at the beach or exploring.  Large lounge room windows provide harbour views. You have full use of the entire studio and complete privacy during your stay. You have complete privacy during your stay. Surry Hills is a vibrant eclectic community and an amazing place to live, and this studio is in the centre of it all. A fantastic range of small bars and restaurants are on your doorstep, along with Sydney's best breakfasts for the next morning. Central to public transport, busses to Bondi Beach and the city are 50 metres from the front door. Travel Card 'Opal' travel cards work on all Sydne
neighborhood_overview: Surry Hills is a vibrant eclectic community and an amazing place to live, and this studio is in the centre of it all. A fantastic range of small bars and restaurants are on your doorstep, along with Sydney's best breakfasts for the next morning. Central to public transport, busses to Bondi Beach and the city are 50 metres from the front door.
notes: WiFi, Apple TV with Netflix App (for use with your own iTunes / Netflix account), 42' TV, Sound Dock
transit: Travel Card 'Opal' travel cards work on all Sydney public transport (trains, busses, ferries). The card itself is free and can be obtained (and value added) at train stations and most convenience stores and newsagents. Travel fees are capped at $15 / day, no matter how far or often you travel in that one day.  Busses Regular busses to Bondi Beach / City / Opera House etc are 50 metres away.  Trains Central train station is a 10 minute walk. Trains from / to Sydney airport arrive at Central Station and  Museum station (you can catch a train to / from the airport at Central or Museum without changing trains).   Uber Uber is readily available throughout Sydney and very reliable.
access: You have full use of the entire studio and complete privacy during your stay.
interaction: You have complete privacy during your stay.
house_rules: No smoking:  No smoking any substance, including e-cigarettes. Lost Keys / Locked out of Apartment:   If you lose the key to the apartment building itself (i.e., the yellow security key) the cost of replacing it is $250. It will be deducted from your security deposit.  If you lock yourself out of the apartment, it is solely your responsibility to contact a locksmith to open the apartment door for you. You are also solely responsible for the cost of the locksmith, including the cost of replacing the lock mechanism if necessary. If the lock mechanism needs to be replaced by the locksmith,  you must provide 2 copies of the new key.

reviews.comments: Ben's place is in the perfect location. Had a lot of fun staying there.

Ben's apartment was perfect for a few days in Sydney - well located, clean, bright and spacious. 
It is quite big for a studio, and the floorplan gives the feel of a separate kitchen, bedroom and living area. 
A great view, well ventilated and bright. 
Ben was a great host, with really good communication. He was very accommodating with check-in and check out times. 
Only downside is that the apartment doesn't have wifi, so perhaps not ideal for business travellers or longer stays.

I enjoyed my stay at Ben's place. Perfect location for public transport either to city (5 mins) or Bondi or Coogee beaches.
Small but has everything you need to explore Sydney with and best of all, great city views!

The apartment is in a nice building with some cool Art Deco details. Location is good - we pretty much walked to all major sights in city (opera house, darling harbour etc.) and there are some great shops and places to eat nearby (thanks to Ben's suggestions). Apartment has all the stuff you need for a comfortable stay, and Ben is super helpful and excellent in communication. We had such a nice time and would recommend Ben's apartment!

Ben was an excellent host; he met me on time and showed me around the apartment ensuring that I was comfortable and had everything I needed. 
The apartment itself is a small but comfortable studio with beautiful views of the city. It's located close to Oxford St with access to public transport if needed. Only a short walk to Darlinghurst and the city. Also, a Woolworths Metro within 200m. 
Loved the place and would stay again.

Bens apartment is in a great location in Sydney close to great restaurants, museums, bars and shopping - Everything you need. Ben was also very friendly,  helpful and communicative. We would highly recommend !
Great central studio!
Great location for work or holiday, clean, lots to explore in the neighborhood, a stress free stay, thanks Ben

Bens apartment was perfect. Great location and everything in Surry Hills, Oxford St and Taylor Sq are walkable. Perfect for Mardi Gra weekend as we watched the parade from the lounge room windows. Would definitely stay here again when in Sydney
에어비앤비숙소중에  가장 좋았다

Ben's place is centrally located with a great view of the Sydney skyline. The place looked exactly as it did in the pictures and was the perfect size for the two of us. Ben was a great host -- always quick to respond to my messages and happy to answer any questions. I would highly recommend this place.
Ben's place was in a great location and close to transit.  We enjoyed the coffee shop downstairs, the shops and theater.
The charming apartment is conveniently located with beautiful view of Sydney Tower and Habour Bridge.
Great location. Apartment exactly like pictures. Perfect for two people and nice and clean. Great communication.

Great location, perfectly positioned for getting into the city or to Bondi. (It's very close to the Darlinghurst nightlife so it can be a bit noisy on weekends, but you can't be in a central location without a little activity!) The apartment is clean and tidy and great for two, with very good shower water pressure. And that gorgeous view across Sydney!
Great apartment in a fantastic central location! All the ammenities you could possible need and an added bonus of harbour bridge views!
It was really nice.
很小巧精致的房间,独立的厨房卫生间,各项设备齐全,居住十分方便｡位置也十分便利,能观望到悉尼大桥和海湾景色｡美中不足的是入住第一晚隔壁房子在举办彻夜的party及高声唱歌,相当打扰睡眠
Amazing view, great area and a great studio
Great pad!
Totally hip neighborhood and convenient to great food, bars and sights. Ben is very nice and helpful. The apartment comfortable and homey.
Ben was a great host, his apartment was central to Sydneys busy CBD and near lots of good places to eat. We would highly recommend staying here.
Great location, nice view. Clean apartment, comfy bed and strong wifi. Close to everything!
風景優美,設施齊全,屋主親切友善,適合情侶居住

L'appartement de Ben est fonctionnel, cosy et très agréable. Ben à été un hôte parfait : bonne communication, présent à notre arrivée pour nous remettre les clés, appartement propre.. bref nous recommandons. Et la vue depuis l'appartement est absolument superbe !!! Coucher et lever de soleil sur Sydney magnifiques !!!
Ben人非常好,提供了很好的帮助｡房间明亮整洁舒适,在市中心位置,去哪里都可以步行｡乘坐公共交通也很方便｡

Staying at Ben's place was fantastic! The view was perfect and the apartment itself was great. It was right in the middle of everything and was full of awesome geeky paraphernalia. Ben's guidebook was also very useful and I greatly appreciated having it. I would definitely choose this as a place to stay again if I get a chance to return to Sydney.

We loved our stay at Ben's apartment! The only very small negative we can say is the noisyness at night on the weekend BUT you can pop to the pharmacy next door and pick up some earplugs and that solves the problem!! Absolutely LOVED the location and decor of the apartment. Ben was so easy to communicate with and made sure that we were comfortable and had everything we needed :-) If you stay here, it is well worth looking at Ben's suggestions for top spots in the area. We went down the road to Bourke St Bakery everyday (amazing coffee and food!!) and went to the Italian restaurant Vacanza on our last night-simply delicious! We would 100% stay again on our next visit to Sydney :-)
A beautiful studio apartment with stunning views in an unbeatable location. Will definitely be staying here again next time. Thanks very much Ben!
Great stay. Great location. Great host.
Great place to stay! Nice and compact, but enough room for two :)

A perfect location to walk to all parts of the city, or to catch well frequented public transport. Many great cafes and quirky shops. Ben's place is the perfect size for a couple and has everything you need for a brief stay.
Clean, cosy and convenient.

It was such a cosy room with a beautiful view out of the window. You can watch the sunrise while sitting on the Sofa and having tee.
It's a really good located appartment, too. Lot's of bar, Cafe's....
We would definately recommend this accomadation!

Ben's place is great, really stunning views of Sydney and a very convenient location. Ben was also very easy to deal with and check in was a breeze. We'll definitely stay here again if we come back to Sydney.

Warm, light filled studio, compact but has everything you need. View from the loo window is pretty cool. 
An abundance of eating & drinking places all within an easy walk, (recommend the 'Shakespeare pub' 200 Devonshire st, for their Thursday night fish and chip special).
Again handy location for the single or couple travellers, easy key pickup and great communication with Ben.

Die Wohnung entsprach genau der Beschreibung, die Schlüsselübergabe klappte hervorragend. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und mit allem Notwendigen ausgestattet. Wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt und würden sie jederzeit wieder buchen.
Great spot! Amazing water and bridge views. Lots of great restaurants and bars within walking distance, and the supermarket is really close. An easy walk to the city.
Was a great stay ! Great view toward the city (can see harbour bridge). Clean and tidy room with great access to public transport

I enjoyed my stay at Ben's place. The studio apartment is cute and neat with a nice view. Great location and very convenient. Check in/check out was easy. Ben is helpful. I would love to stay at his place again next time I am in Sydney.

A fabulous place to stay, such a vibrant area with lots of great places to eat.
Ben was really easy to deal with and great communication. Such great value for money, would highly recommend.

My partner and I had a great stay at Ben's place. The place is small but just a perfect size for a couple and base for a City weekend. 
The location is fantastic and so many great little bars at cafes at hand. Very handy having a pharmacy below and also a Metro supermarket a few minutes walk. 
This really is a great value for money considering the location and Ben is so easy to deal with.

Very well located studio, very clean and with a beautiful view on the city. It was perfect to visit Sydney as the flat is very near the buses and the center can be easilly acesssed by foot. Ben was very helpful to answer quickly in case of questions. I recommand this location and will return if I come back to Sydney :-)

This was undoubtedly the worst air bnb experience I have ever had.
The studio is filled with the hosts things in drawers, it is very noisy, the shower handles fell off and there were a random pair of rusty nail scissors on the floor, we had people knocking on our door in the night and every single day the block smelt like weed from someone smoking inside.
About 6 days into our stay the toilet started leaking - pretty gross when it's leaking on the floor after flushing. I let ben know and he didn't reply. I chased 2 days later and he agreed to come and take a look - afterwards the issue was much worse and the entire floor was covered in water, the shower then also wouldn't turn off. Ben told me he would look into a plumber coming and once again failed to get in touch - I chased and said it was uninhabitable like that .. and Ben then demanded that we leave that very day with no compromise with time to find somewhere else, despite us having 4 nights left and visiting from London. 
Awful experience all around.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place is pretty awesome. It is pretty close to anything you would really need. Within about a 1.5 mile radius (35 min walk) we could really get to any part of town of interest, and anything else uber is always convenient. The place is small and cozy, nothing more you need for your stay. The TV is a smart TV with the youtube app which (we didnt realize till after staying in our other airbnb's without it) was awesome! 

The only thing is, the bed and the couch kind of sunk in. So we ended up sleeping on the ground. Which honestly isnt bad at all, and made my back feel muuuch better the next day. Honestly didnt detract from the experience at all.

Wow......this met all of our expectations and more. Clean and tidy with fresh sheets on a comfy bed and Sheridan towels. Not to mention the extras that I wont bother to take next time we stay like umbrellas, shopping bags, tea bags, band aids and spare blankets. Perhaps having  a hairdryer available would have lightened my luggage! 
Check in and check out was easy. Ben was available ,approachable and very helpful. 
The location was perfect for exploring Sydney. A 20 min stroll down historic Oxford St to Darling Harbour. Many different buses right out the front to Centre Point, Bondi, Circular Quay  just to mention a few. Don't forget to get your Opal card from any newsagent and you can top it up with cash on line! Walking distance to the train to explore further a field.
 The studio apartment on the 7th floor has spectacular views ( the photos don't lie!) and is nestled in a friendly community with many restaurants/cafes/shops/chemists all within walking distance. We will be back for many visits I am sure...thanks again Ben!

We had a great stay at Ben’s place. The location is perfect for exploring Sydney and the apartment had all the amenities we needed, including a well equipped kitchen. We’d definitely stay here again. Ben was quick to respond and he kindly left us some ice lollies, as we had hot weather the first few day!

Ben's place was very comfortable and close to all public transport and commercial points. We had a wonderful stay. Apartment was very well equipped. Ben was also very quick in response for qns we had on any facility at home.

Ben was an amazing host who had everything we needed. 
The apartment has a fantastic view of the city skyline and bridge, as well as everything you out need for a comfortable stay.
This apartment is in an excellent location to see Sydney and enjoy the area of Surry Hills. A cosy and compact apartment providing everything you need. Ben was very easy to contact and accommodating.

Ben’s place is in a lively, busy Sydney neighbourhood. There’s always lots going on and plenty of great places to eat, drink and socialise. We recommend Messina for amazing ice cream and Bourke St Bakery - both within walking distance.
The apartment itself is cosy, compact and ideal for solo travellers or couples who don’t need too much space. It’s bright, stylishly decorated and has all the amenities you’ll need for a few days in the city.
Cute studio apartment with bridge views. Easy walk to Darling Harbor and very friendly and accomodating host. Would definitely recommend Ben's place.
Great location, clean apartment, amazing host. Definitely recommend
Great apartment close to the centre of town

This is a lovely, clean apartment in a very central location. Close to public transport and everything else we needed (e.g. Supermarket, cafes, restaurants). The apartment is very spacious for two people and the view is amazing, we even had a great view of some fireworks on our last night. I would definitely recommend this place. Ben was also a great host and easy to communicate with!

Ben's apartment is situated among trendy cafes and bars. It's also only a short walk to a train station, and a longer walk to many tourist attractions. Check-in was easy and the host  was communicative. Weoved our stay. Thank you, Ben!
The view from Ben's place was spectacular!!!

Lovely apartment with everything you need! In an excellent location with many great little restaurants and bars nearby. Grocery store is also just down the road. Close to bus stops that'll take you to all of Sydney's major destinations as well as a 10 min walk from Central Station. Ben was a great host and was super easy to communicate with. Would love to stay here again in the future!

Worst Airbnb experience ever! On arrival, the apartment was quite grubby and full of host's personal possessions with only 2 drawers left for the two of us over a fortnight. The fridge had half empty jars, food stains were all over the cabinet doors, and the place was dusty.
We had a disaster in that we accidentally left the keys in the apartment (that locks behind you!). We were unable to contact Ben for over 2 days as he had left the country without informing us - ending with us out on the street for hours, having to stay in a hostel overnight and eventually paying for a locksmith as we desperately needed our belongings. Ben was not even remotely apologetic once he finally got in contact with us. 
Once we asked him if it was possible for him to reimburse for the locksmith and other costs, he replied aggressively with snarky and unnecessarily nasty comments about our stay - saying we had left wet towels on the floor when actually we had left one wet towel in the laundry basket that we had used to clean the water from the leaking toilet that was a great inconvenience throughout our stay and has been a complaint from another guest. Also said we raked through his personal belongings which were against his 'rules', when actually we only used a couple of towels from a drawer since he only left us one bath towel for two people for a fortnight. Ben has also attempted to charge us 100AUD regarding a small stain on the bed sheet, which is a completely ridiculous price especially considering the fee that we paid for cleaning.
Furthermore, we asked where he would like his new keys to be left so he could get back in his apartment - to which eventually he said to 'leave them on the kitchen table'. This obviously doesn't make any sense and he only replied a few hours before our departure so we replied we would leave one of the keys in an envelope in his letterbox under his other mail. Only after we requested reimbursement days after we had left, he replied in a hostile manner that he had to pay for his own locksmith as we didn't leave him his key(?). 
Overall a dreadful experience that we wouldn't like anyone else to go through, as leaving the keys in an apartment when the door locks behind your back could essentially happen to anyone. This could have been handled far more efficiently & pleasantly if the host had actually been a decent person so BEWARE.
We travelled with a 4 month old baby. Ben's place was a great location, close to everything - shops, food, transport. Ben was a great communicator and offered us a late check out which was perfect.
Wonderful location, spectacular views.
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Ben was very responsive and the location of the accommodation is convenient.  It can get noisy on the weekend tho... Overall, a great experience to stay at Ben’s place! Thanks!

reviews.comments: O Ivo é um excelente anfitrião. Fomos muito bem recebidos. É super simpático e disponível. O quarto era optimo, e a casa tem muito boas condições, com bons espaços comuns (que o Ivo disponibilizou automaticamente). O check in e o check out é flexível. Bastou-nos mandar uma msg ao Ivo e combinamos com ele a hora que nos era mais vantajosa.
It was a very nice experience to stay at Ivo´s place. He is a great host and a nice person. The flat is nice and spacious. I would absolutly reccomend the palce :)

ivo war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, die Kommunikation lief super, auch wenn ich ihn selber nur kurz gesehen habe.
Die Wohnung hat eine gute Anbindung, mit der man schnell ins Stadtzentrum kommt. muito obrigada, ivo.

Ich habe mich bei ivo sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Unterkunft ist sauber und geräumig. Es gibt einen Balkon und die Zimmer sind sehr schön. Es gibt auch eine Badewanne :D. Ivo hat mir sehr geholfen eine Wohnung zu finden und mir ein wenig die Stadt gezeigt. Sehr zu empfehlen.

Super séjour chez Ivo ! 
Nous avons été super bien accueillit, l'appartement correspond aux photos. 
Il nous a fait découvrir la ville et a été très sympa avec nous. 
Première expérience sur Airbnb super contente du voyage !

La experiencia en Porto fue maravillosa, y gran parte de ello fue gracias a Ivo y su cálida hospitalidad e interés en conocer a los demás, la casa es muy acogedora y, para mi gusto, bastante bien situada, no se tarda mucho en ir al centro y es un lugar muy tranquilo. Obrigada pela ajuda, às recomendações da series e por ser uma gran pessoa.
전체적인 분위기는 좋습니다 친절한 주인과 근접한 마켓이랑 다만 거리가 조금있지만 가격대비 만족스럽습니다. 요리가능해서 매일 만들어서 먹고 편하게 잘쉬다 갑니다

I spent almost an entire month at Ivo's place and I can highly recommend it to other travelers. He is not just a perfect host but an amazing guy as well - open, friendly, and helpful. The place is perfect for a long term stay because it's quiet, cost and relatively clean. The wifi is fast and reliable. The only downside is the distance from the city center. However, the bus stop is basically around the corner, with frequent busses running from early in the morning until late in the evening.

Thank you Ivo for everything, I hope to see you again this summer ;)
I recommend Ivo's apartment for everyone how's coming to Porto and is looking for nice and quiet place in suburb, at fair price.

Le logement d'Ivo est très spacieux et bien tenu. Un peu loin du centre mais très bien desservi par les bus donc il n'y a aucun souci pour visiter ! 
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour chez Ivo et de merveilleuses vacances à Porto !

Had a great time at Ivo's flat.
He's a really nice guy, easy going and accessible. The place was perfect for the month I've spent in Porto. Cooked a lot and worked some from there and felt truly at home.
Even though it's not in the city center, it is easy to get public transport there. Local amenities help a lot as well, such as market and stores. :)
Greatly recommend.

Ivo was super comprehensive and a  very nice host, as me and my husband had to go out earlier than the final day of our reservation. The comunication was easy and fast and he was available for any questions at any time. The room and bathroom were clean

Ivo is a great host! Very thoughtful and kind. He let me check in earlier then we first agreed on, and even came home during his lunch break from work to meet me. He was very kind and also let me change room, as I thought the other room looked more comfortable. The room is of good size. It is a bit far from the city center, but there is a bus stop right down the street, like 2 min walk, and the bus only takes 10 min. I also walked a lot of the times, it took about 30-40 min, so it’s not that bad. Overall a great stay. I highly recommend his place :)
We had a nice stay at Ivo’s place. Good location, a quick Uber or bus ride from the city centre. Easy parking for our rental car. Very quiet apartment.

Квартира действительно находится в 1-2 минутах ходьбы от площади Таксим и к главной прогулочной улицы всего Стамбула.
3 этаж, маленькая и уютная. Холодильник и мини-кухня отлично подойдут тем,кто иногда хочет что-то приготовить.
Спальное место и в целом интерьер очень милые. Однако, фото не соответствует той квартире,которую мне дали. Квартиры между собой как близнецы, но с разным расположением окон и дверей. Нам дали не ту,что в объявлении.
Повторюсь, это никак не испортило впечатление, так как они практически не отличаются.
Окна выходят на соседний дом, который буквально в 2-3 метрах, поэтому шторы всегда были закрыты.
Цена радует. Рядом находятся различные рестораны, обмены денег и небольшие магазины.
Ergun -хороший хозяин, нас нисколько не беспокоил. Если возникали вопросы, то стучали в его дверь (он живет этажом ниже) и всегда получали помощь.
Соседи и другие шумы не беспокоили, уличного шума тоже не было.
Так что квартиру рекомендую)

Ergun was very respectful man and so cooperative. He contacted before arriving and guided me to his apartment. He is very lovely and always smile and has a quick response.
I advice to deal with him. 
The only two issues for me :
First the studio was so small and you need to take your loggaege to upper stairs until you get the elevator.
Actually I say many thanks to mr Ergun.

We have been in the studio for 13 nights , Ergun was always presents and houpful , the llcation was perfect near to everything ,there was just the probleme of cleaning but you can do it yourself all was disponible . If i come back to istanbul Ergun will be our distination ..thank you verry much
I can see why Ergun is a super host, the place was great and he was very responsive and helpful. Thanks!
great location ; very reasonable price and Ergun is more than host .. he will act as a friend when you need help.
Mr Ergun is a great host, the apartment is tiny but clean and located in a wonderful position!

Ergun is great and attentive, the apartment is no frills but is exactly as advertised.  Its super clean, secure a great location.   The toilet and bathroom are very small so might be a bit too intimate for a couple to share but I found if perfect for a solo traveler.

Ergun очень приятный человек! Это одно из главных плюсов на отдыхе !
Он Быстро отвечает на все интересующие вопросы

Ночью отлично спали с открытым окном и особого шума на улице не было ( район спокойный)
Ergun всегда отвечал быстро на наши вопросы и помогал в наших вопросах )
Я с радостью вернусь снова !
The location is great! The apartment is small, but it has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Ergum gave us a warm reception and met us since we had issues finding the apartment.

The location for me was perfect as I was there for a training course in the neighborhood. The studio is 2 minutes from Taksim square and therefore close to the main restaurant area and shopping  streets in this region and 20mins from Galata tower. Taksim also has decent public transportation opportunities to go to other places in the city. Additionally, the apartment was just 5mins from the Havabüs shuttle busses to the Sabiha Gökçen Airport. The studio is small and cute and had everything that I  needed and Ergun was quick to respond and a really nice guy. The only minor comments I have would be the noise from the busy street outside and the mosque. I would also recommend Ergun to provide some extra blankets for the colder evenings in autumn/wintertime :).

host.host_about:
Erin: Professionally, during the day I am the head of engineering at The New York Times' Beta department, In the afternoons, I teach at Cooper Union, and in the evening I do fun side-projects with my brother. In my free time though (usually during the summer) I enjoy traveling a lot, with both family and friends: paris, london, tokyo, delhi, berlin, etc.

Marla:  I'm a veteran teacher/librarian in the New York City public schools.  I teach in a dual-language Spanish/English school and use my spare time to quilt, cook, read, and bike.  I also love traveling, especially if it's a place I've never been.  Some of my favorite trips have taken me to Guatemala, Norway, Morocco, and Chile.

We are both from Pittsburgh, PA and recently got married there :)  We've been living in New York for just over ten years.  You can count on us for good subway advice  and the best bike route!

reviews.comments: We stayed two nights, 3 edults and 2 kids, at Erin & Maria's place. The location was great and we used the subway to go into Manhattan several times. The house had everything we needed, it was clean and tidy. Also the car parking at the place was very convenient.

Erin and Marla have a fantastic house - a great place for us to come for a long holiday weekend from Michigan to visit our son and daughter-in-law who live in Brooklyn .   The hosts are welcoming and at ease.  The listing is accurate.  It is a huge kid-friendly house! - even friendly for us and our grown up children.  It was especially nice to be able to park our car in their driveway and conveniently walk to a nearby subway stop.  The neighborhood seemed quiet and peaceful.  The house was well appointed with all the conveniences to make it feel like home (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Loft in Kailua
summary: Beautifully furnished, elegant,  very spacious two story, private loft.    Perfect for the working professional, couple, or 2 singles.  Loft in Kailua is just three minutes from world famous Kailua Beach, and the town of Kailua with all of it's fabulous shopping and dining! Includes a kitchenette,  washer/dryer, internet and parking.   Price quoted includes all applicable taxes.
space: This well appointed one bedroom split level loft apartment is beautifully furnished with high ceilings and open floor plan.  The upstairs has a shuttered master suite with queen bed, a huge en-suite full bath that has a soaking tub and separate shower, a spacious walk in closet and separate office.  There is a small room next to the office with a queen bed for an additional person if needed.   The downstairs has a kitchen and dining area with 1/2 bath, and washer/dryer.   Both the upstairs and downstairs have a/c, internet and cable TV.  Free Parking is included.   Perfect for the working professional, couple, or 2 singles.  Loft in Kailua is just three minutes from world famous Kailua Beach, and the town of Kailua with all of it's fabulous shopping, dining, recreation and entertainment, once you visit you'll never want to leave.

neighborhood_overview: The Loft in Kailua is located in a very quiet neighborhood .  A 3 minute drive into the  town and 5 minute drive to Kailua beach .....you can walk or bike around the lake for exercise also or just walk up to  the neighborhood market and restaurants .  Excellent location!
transit: A car is suggested.  Kailua town and Kailua Beach are a 10 minute walk from The Loft in Kailua.    It's great to have your own car to drive to the north shore  or  other island   Although we also have a great bus line and there is always Lyft and uber if you don't want to go far   It's very easy to get around .
access: The loft has a private entrance, separate from the main house(Home Sweet Home), also listed on Airbnb.  The only shared area is the carport.
interaction: We will meet them when they arrive to give them the keys and general information about the loft and Kailua.   Our guests can contact us anytime  for any needs or questions they have during their stay.     We are always happy to give them ideas on where to go or what to do....neighborhood restaurants  shopping ideas  .  We give them complete privacy in their own home  but can be reached by phone if they need anything.

The main bedroom is large and airy with a comfy queen bed, huge built-in wardrobe, drawer chest and drawers under the bed.  The second bedroom has a comfy single bed with drawers and a baby cot, plus a double wardrobe. neighborhood_overview: Hurlstone park is a great, safe and quiet family neighbourhood with wide, shady streets and lots of parking, big park and lots of playgrounds. There are few playgrounds close to our home, one is just up the street and there is one enclosed playground just opposite the excellent bakery café on the main street. The Cooks river walk/bike path and the big park is just 5 minutes walk. The park is right next to the Cooks river pat and has big grassy areas with shades and covered tables for picnics, kids playground and football field. To the west you can walk down to Aldi/Woolworths in Canterbury and to the South/East towards Marrickville.
notes: $300 fully refundable key deposit is required.
transit: Our place is on the Bankstown line which takes you directly to Sydney CBD or Circular Quay (home of the Sydney Opera house and the famous NYE firework). These are approximate distances t o important places from our place: - 2 minutes walk to the train station & bus stop - 10 min walk or 1 train stop to the light rail that takes you to Darling Harbour - 25 min train ride to Sydney CBD - 2 min walk to the main street where you can find a supermarket, Asian shops, a bakery, excellent bakery café, few hairdresser and beauty salons, news agent, ATM, laundry & dry cleaners  - 5 min walk to the great Cooks river bike/walking pathway - 5 min drive/15 min walk/1 train stop with the Bankstown line to Aldi/Woolworths supermarkets -  10 min drive to Ashfield shopping mall or 15 min on the bus 406 (bus stop in front of the train station) - 2 min walk to the bus stop (in front of the train station) where you can take route 418 which will take you to Bondi Junction (1hr ride)  - Sydneham junction tra

host.host_about:
Hello fellow travellers! We are a young family of three that enjoys traveling, exploring new places, meeting new people and sharing knowledge and experiences.
Pre-baby we travelled a lot and our favorite destinations so far are Amsterdam and Thaliand. 

Our travel experiences enriched our lives and enhaced our firm belief in sharing, nurturing and respect for human relationships and Nature. 

We believe that people are people, and they have more or less same issues or life questions and strive for happiness no matter what their socioeconomic, religious or cultural background is. After all, we are all made of the same material - Star dust, all other differences are just shades on the canvas called life.

Appartement parfait pour trois personnes ou couple + 1 enfant. Littéralement à deux pas de la station de train Hurlstone Park sur la ligne T3 qui amène au cœur de Sydney donc très pratique pour visiter la ville tout en étant au calme. Quartier résidentiel très calme avec petits commerces dans la rue adjacente et parc pas loin. Bref idéal pour aller découvrir Sydney en étant dans un petit coin calme. Rien à redire sur la propreté des lieux. Nous ne nous sommes pas croisés avec Angelina mais elle a su répondre à toutes nos demandes. Merci à elle et sa famille pour ce séjour.

name: Single private room(Gray)
summary: This private room is located on 1st floor in a shared flat. Flats location is a few steps away from main Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere of local attractions.
space: We've private rooms for Erasmus students / foreign visitors in a secure & crowded area in the heart of Taksim/Beyoglu. We're located very close to Tunel Square, a few steps away from Istiklal Street surrounded by historical atmosphere, close to the major shopping districts, public transport, historical places, consulates (we're side by side with Russian & Swedish Consulates f.e.) This shared flat has 5 private rooms. Each room has its OWN bed, wardrobe & desk. There's also an unlimited WI-FI access, heating in every room and every room takes direct sunlight except one. Kitchen, bathroom and living room are shared areas in every floor except the privately rented apartments. You can take your shower whenever you want. There is hot water 24/7, you can watch TV and DvDs when you want to chill in front of the tv on a comfy couch.  Please contact me personally for details, I hope I'll be able to help you! Feel free to ask me about safe transportation directly from airport to my location and

host.host_about:
Greetings traveller!

I'm 38 years old freelancer, graduated from graphic design. Currently running my own business, renovating and renting private rooms & flats in the heart of Istanbul mostly for incoming visitors since 2010.

I will be glad if I can help for your accommodation need, and if i can make you feel at home!

reviews.comments:
I just booked a room for a night, before taking my flight. So I can't fully describe Dama's House. However, I can say Ali is a very very nice guy, he welcomed me very well. The room was clean, small but pretty and well arranged. Idem for the bathroom. About the location, it's nearby Karakoy's port (from there, you can go to Uskudar etc.) and nearby Istikal, a famous shopping street going to Taksim (a center place to take a bus and to go to the airport for example).
Finally I can recommend Ali and Dama's House ;)

I stayed two terrific nights at Dama's House.  It is in a wonderful location with shops and transportation in close proximity.  The common spaces (i.e. sitting room, kitchen and bathroom) of the house were clean, and my private room was larger than I expected.  Access to the washing machine was a very helpful amenity.

Great place to stay for a short or long term, international people, really comfortable furniture and very polite landlord. I can really recommend this accommodation. Thanks Ali, for make my stay so special in your house.

Dama's House is the perfect location if you want to discover Istanbul on your holidays or if you are there for Erasmus studies. The neighbourhood is really safe and central and the room is clean. But most of all, Ali is a great host who is helpful no matter what you need: a cab, recommendations for food and drinks, just anything!

I stayed for 4 weeks in the Gray Room in Dama's House and loved this place. The flat is very central (next street to Istiklal Caddesi), very clean and comfortable. Ali was was a great and cooperative host. Thank you very much!! :)

Ali was very communicative before I arrived in Istanbul, gave very clear directions to the apartment, and was welcoming and accessible throughout my stay.  The room itself--the grey room--was simple and lovely, in an apartment ideally located in Beyoglu within easy walking distance of everything I needed.  Perfect.  Ali also arranged reliable early morning transport to Ataturk airport for me on the day of my departure.  It was a really great place to stay, private and simple and friendly.  Strongly recommended.
Perfect location and very very nice people. Only problem was that the bed is not very good, my back was hurting when I woke up.

Ali was a great host. Very friendly and helpful. I stayed a week in the Grey Room. After a warm welcome, Ali gave me a street map of Istanbul and a nice present. The Location is just two minutes away from Istiklal Cad., very cool! Thank you Ali, for sharing your place.

Ali was a great host, so welcoming and helpful, he will make you feel at home.
he is ready to help in any situation, I had an argument with the taxi driver who was taking me to Ali's place and even before I meet with Ali in person, I called him to talk to the driver in Turkish since the communications in English was useless, Ali was ready to help and he solved the problem with the Taxi driver.
For the room its good size room, I had a stay in the Indian room as well, You will met nice people in Ali's apartment, the diversity of the guests will leave a great chance for a culture-exchange, and if you're planing to stay for a long period of time, there will be a possibility of making good friends.
Location is just perfect, 3 minutes walking up the hill to Istiklal Street where you can see the Turkish modern lifestyle surrounded by historical buildings and unique gift boutiques, live music, good food and the best part is Galatasary tower just 7 minutes walking .
I also liked the fact that the building has elevator so you don't have to worry about lefting your luggage!
I definitely recommend Ali's place and the best thing about it is Ali himself.

I had a very good experience at Dama house during my holidays in Istanbul. It's very central and that allowed me to walk to almost everywhere. The house is in a quiet street and it has all the facilities, also Ali has been always very quick replying to any questions and very easy person to deal with. I will definitely stay again there in my next trip to Istanbul.

Ali was great and met me even though I arrived a few hours later than expected.  The room was just as advertised.  The other guests seemed very nice though I didn't have much of a chance to get to know them.  The location is excellent, near the Shish-hane Metro stop, at one end of Istiklal, the pedestrian mall that leads to Taksim Square, full of boutiques, restaurants, buskers, and the world's most flamboyant ice-cream merchant.  Be aware, however, that the neighborhood is full of very steep hills--I brought only sneakers and my feet suffered.

Ali fue un excelente anfitrión; me brindó la información necesaria antes de mi viaje para evitar contratiempos y durante mi estadía siempre estuvo disponible, sin importar la hora, para orientarme y ayudarme a vivir una experiencia maravillosa en Estambul. Su buena disposición superó mis expectativas.
El alojamiento es muy agradable y cómodo, es evidente el esmero de Ali por garantizar el confort de los huéspedes, está equipado con todo lo necesario para llevar la vida cotidiana como en casa y se nota que hace renovaciones permanentemente para que todo esté en muy buen estado. Con una excelente ubicación, situado a dos minutos de la avenida Istiklal  esta cerca de todo; en mi caso hice buena parte de las visitas desplazándome a pie. Para ir a otros lugares de interés, la estación del metro y de tramway están igualmente muy cerca, llegar a Santa Sofía o la mezquita azul toma sólo unos 15 minutos.
Las noches en el barrio Beyoglu son simplemente fantásticas, restaurantes, bares, cafés, centros comerciales, espectáculos callejeros, etc. me sentí en el corazón de Estambul.
Así mismo, Ali selecciona cuidadosamente sus huéspedes permitiendo disfrutar de una agradable compañía.
Sin duda Ali contribuyó a que mi primera visita a esta bella ciudad fuera inolvidable.

The Grey room is a quite small room in a very nice in a very nice location right next to Istiklal. I had a very good time sharing the flat with some nice people from all over the world, mostly also "longstayers". Ali was great and allways reachable when needed. The flat was clean and in a good condition. Absolutly nothing to complain about.

Ali was great from day one - gave me all the information and help I could've possibly wanted and welcomed me personally to the flat. He even went the extra step to ask me whether I needed anything on my day of departure such as a taxi to the airport. The room is just as described and perfect for a single person travelling for a short period of time. What made the experience especially special was meeting the other young people living in the flat who were great and with whom I had a fab weekend!

The house was very clean, Is stiuated in heart of the city center, close to evrything! All safe the building looked like! 

Anything i needed Ali arranged for me. 

Hopefully going there again !
Miguel

Ali was a most welcoming host. He responded to all questions within remarkable short time and willingness to answer all of them. He also provided all necessary information to comfortably arrive to the house.
I had a specific request that involved me not being there all nights and he was very open to make the situation fit to my needs.
I would definitely come back to him and his place.
It's a comfortable and really quite place. Location is great. Ali, the owner, is a real gentlemen who helps, facilitates your stay.  I recommend this place and I'll definitely come back again.

The room is in a central but quiet place close to Sishane Metro station where you can reach several points of interest from.
Ali is a helpful host welcoming you even in the late hours. He provides you with water (drinking tap water is not recommended) towels and soap.

Это была моя первая поездка в Стамбул, очень переживала за то, как все пройдет. Как оказалось, мои волнения были напрасны: Али замечательный хозяин, подробно ответил на все мои вопросы, объяснил как добраться от аэропорта до квартиры, без проблем встретил меня в 02:00 (я прилетела поздно ночью). Моя комната оказалась маленькой, но уютной с красивым окошком, выходящим в небольшой зеленый сад. Что касается удобств, то здесь достаточно скромно, но есть все необходимое: хорошее соотношение цены и качества. Сама квартира находится в очень хорошем месте: это небольшая спокойная улица всего в 2 минутах ходьбы от улицы Истикляль, где расположено великое множество магазинов, кафе и ресторанов на любой вкус и кошелек. Рядом метро и остановки общественного транспорта. Также неподалеку находится Галатская башня, музеи, рыбный рынок, можно легко добраться до района Фатих (пешком через Галатский мост всего за 15-20 минут). Мои соседи оказались очень приветливыми, дружелюбными и позитивными ребятами, мне было легко и приятно общаться в ними, даже не смотря на мой ужаснейший английский)) Подводя итог, хочу сказать, что моя поездка удалась на все 500%, и выбор данного места сыграл немаловажную роль: здесь можно с головой окунуться в атмосферу удивительного Стамбула, забыть о том, что ты турист и просто наслаждаться этим великолепным городом. Уже задумалась о моей следующей поездке в Стамбул!
Огромное спасибо, Али! Больше гостей и больше друзей в твоем доме :)

Ali is really an outstanding host. While it may be cliche to say that he responds to 'everything' Ali really cares about his  tenants/clients and responds to everything in a very timely and immediate fashion. Ali is always happy to help with anything. The location I stayed at was really cleanly kept, rules were fair and clear, and the price point is unbeatable for the location!  I strongly, strongly recommend Ali!

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Olá,

Estou no Airbnb desde 2011 e sou um grande fã da Plataforma. Tudo que conquistei foi graças ao sucesso no Airbnb!

Minha experiência começou quando recebi um flat da minha avó através de herança (em vida!!), investi pesado na reforma do apartamento para poder oferecer o maior conforto possível aos meus hóspedes. Comecei a administrar seu aluguel e o sucesso foi tão grande que mudou a minha vida!

Meus amigos e familiares viram como o meu “negócio” estava dando certo e começaram a pedir para que eu também administrasse o aluguel dos apartamentos deles (nessa época ainda não existia a figura do co-host). 

Topei o desafio e o número de apartamentos foi se multiplicando! O resultado foi ótimo e percebi que me sentia muito realizado com as experiências que estava ganhando como empreendedor e ao conhecer pessoas de tantos lugares do mundo! De tal maneira que decidi largar meu emprego como gestor em marketing para me dedicar exclusivamente a vocês!

Fiz um curso de guia de turismo para ter mais conhecimento sobre a cidade e abri a All in Rio, uma Agência de Turismo que oferece tours culturais, naturais e de aventura, além do aluguel de apartamentos de temporada.

Meu objetivo é oferecer uma estadia segura, confortável e poder fornecer todas as informações necessárias para você desfrutar ao máximo a sua experiência em nossa cidade maravilhosa! 

Obrigado pela atenção!

Fabio

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi!

I've been on Airbnb since 2011 and I’m a big fan of the Platform. All I got was thanks to my success on Airbnb!

My experience began when I received a flat from my grandmother through inheritance (in life!!). I invested heavily in the renovation of the apartment to be able to offer the greatest comfort possible to my guests. I started managing the rent and the success was so amazing that it changed my life!

My friends and family noticed how well my "business" was going and started to ask me to manage their apartment’s rent too (at the time, the figure of  the co-host didn’t exist).

I accepted the challenge and the number of apartments was multiplying! The result was great and I realized that I felt very fulfilled with the experiences I was gaining as an entrepreneur and by meeting people from so many places in the world! So I decided to leave my job as a marketing manager to dedicate myself exclusively to you!

I took a tour guide course to gain more knowledge about the city and opened the All in Rio, a Tourism Agency that offers cultural, natural and adventure tours, as well as apartments for seasonal rents.

My goal is to offer you a safe and comfortable stay and to be able to provide all the information necessary so you can enjoy your experience in our wonderful city to the fullest!

Thank you for your time!

Fabio
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Comments from my guests:

“This apartment is in the most amazing location. Leblon is beautiful, safe, and packed with fabulous restaurants. The apartment is just by the ocean - couldn't really be better. Communicating with Fabio was super-easy. He was really responsive and helpful. We are missing it already!” - Ed Pilkington (UK)
“Fabio goes far and beyond the average host, my trip was a day earlier than I booked and I would have been stuck with no place to stay but Fabio personally went out of his way to get the place ready for me, great guy and will always go to him first when traveling to Rio. Thank again Fabio abs!!” - Darren Sanford (USA)

notes: Excellent Location =============== Vila Isabel is located in a central part of the city considered to be in the North Zone. It's near downtown and has many pubs and options of public transportation (subway, taxis and buses to all areas of the city). Distances ======= • Pubs - 12 min walk / 1 km • Mall (Tijuca Shopping Center) – 13 min walk / 1 km • Subway (Sãens Pena Station) - 18 min walk / 1,4 km • Maracanã Stadium - 18 min walk / 1,5 km  • Bakery / Snack bar (Padaria Arte & Pão and others) - 4 min walk / 300 m • Extra Boulevard Supermarket - 5 min walk / 400 m • Merkofruit Mini Market - 4 min walk / 300 m • Downtown - 13 min car / 20 min subway / 8,6km • Copacabana - 17 min car / 30 min subway / 13,9km • Ipanema - 19 min car / 35 min subway / 14,8km

access: The guests will have access to all house facilities, cable TV and WIFI.
interaction: We would like to meet you and talk about the city. We speak Portuguese, English and Spanish. We'll be in town and you can contact us whenever you need.
house_rules: ILLEGAL ACTIVITIES: Use of illegal drugs, prostitution and parties will NOT be allowed in the property. TENANT CONDUCT: Quiet hours will be from 10 pm to 8 am. During quiet hours radios and stereos may be played at a level not to be heard outside of the house. PROPERTY DAMAGE: Damage caused by the behavior of a Tenant, or a Tenant’s guest, will be repaired with the Tenant’s expenses. KEYS AND ACCESS TO THE HOUSE: We will meet the guest at the apartment on check-in and hand over the keys. It is the Tenant’s responsibility to return them at check-out. If there are not guess arriving I`m very flexible with the check in and check out. It is allowed to smoke, bring pets except cats.

summary: This condo in the heart of Montreal is gorgeous. Five minutes away from downtown Ottawa! There are plenty of charming local shops & restaurants around. I am normally at the place to tidy up around noon time.  If time suits I will meet my guests downstairs during check-in and bring them to the room.  Otherwise the keys can be found in a password-protected mailbox at the building entrance. The apartment is next to a football court, a not busy district yet buying things having food and traffic is not bad. It is close to the Prince Edward area on one side. neighborhood_overview: The apartment is next to a football court, a not busy district yet buying things having food and traffic is not bad. It is close to the Prince Edward area on one side. Places to go include Fa Yuen Street, the Fish Market, the Flower Market etc. On the other side is Sham Shui Po which is the authentic Hong Kong. Sham Shui Po has no tourist spot but it is a place where locals live. You will have a very understanding of the local culture in this area. Everyday goods are sold cheap in the street. Fresh market. Local food. And night second hand market.
notes: There is no elevator.  Need to walk 4 floors. The calendar is correct.
transit: Walking distance to both Prince Edward MTR station and Sham Shui Po MTR station. Bus E21 to and fro the airport and is just 2 minute walk from the building. Buses and mini-bus downstairs going to places through out Hong Kong.
access: The whole room and the platform outside the window.

reviews.comments:
My third day in morning in HongKong, it was heavy rain by typhoon. I actually wanted to stay in Central area to see the night view and to go other place for sightseeing. But things is not going well as you think!! I asked over 20 hosts from the morning, but the only one host gave me a certain answer i can stay in safe! 
Yes, that was the Vintage style of dormitory shared room for girl. As you see the room has a fantastic vintage colour in it and the bed was so cleaned and the fan and air-condition worked very well in humid HongKong summer weather! 
The host steve, he is a very kind and gentle for the guest! 
The toilet is a very small and tiny space, but you should experience how HongKong people use their space well. I was so impressed for that too :)

Also with a very happy price, you will have sweet dream indeed!!!

The house is really close to the PrinceEdward station by walk 10 minutes and there is a public football court as well. Safe place and 7 eleven convenience store is just around corner! 

I really recommend a guest house when you guys to travel. This is what I experienced in HongKong :)

Awesome experience. Clean and cosy room. Easy to locate and near MTR. 

Appreciate steve's effort to clean the room before arrival. Thanks!!

Regards

Jess poon
Steve是一个很负责的房东 住客也很好 下次再来
Steve人超级好的!房间虽然小,可是东西很齐全｡室友也很好｡下次去香港还是会找Steve!这次时间太短没办法跟Steve好好聊聊~期待下次见面吧!

住的地方的地理位置簡直棒呆!想去哪裡都非常方便!房間整潔,空調給力｡在旅行的最後一天,我､兩個室友､Steve和Steve介紹的三個帥哥靚仔男神去香港的一些小地方玩(具體還是要自己體會的)!很愉快!總的來說,這個地方,這個房間,這個包租公(說的就是Steve!)值得選擇啦~

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 草雞仔
房东虽然没有见到,但是给了很详细的地址给我,让我能顺利找到,这也是一次很有趣的寻钥匙之旅,房子里面挺好的,床也很舒服,就是厕所小了点,其他都挺不错的,下次有机会想住一下男女混合宿舍,感觉很好玩哦,而且,房租又不会,赞一个!
Room was really clean, toilet is tad small but otherwise well worth the price. Location is great, walkable to Mongkok and Sham shui po. Will come again if I am visiting Hong Kong next time.

Although only stayed in Steve's place for one night but it was a pleasant place to stay at... Convenient and not too far away from the metro station.. Quite neighborhood and u can feel the authentic authentic HK lifestyle...
房東回覆的效率超好,有問必達唷!房間也乾淨,大部分旅客需要的日常所需,都有提供,下次來香港,一定會再回來住｡

First of all, to be honest the host was not helpful at all.
I didn't get the chance to meet Steve and it was my first trip to HK by myself. I got lost from the MTR to the dorm in the evening and walked around for an hour.
The room has not been cleaned and untidy at the time I checked in, and don't let me start with the bathroom :s

Overall, the stay was not really pleasant for me.
Maybe I will be luckier next time.
Steve 人好好 有求必应!房间虽然小 但什么都有 床铺很干净 说得也很舒服很安心!下次还会来!

This place is fantastic,it's not far from the subway.The room is not very spacious but have everthing you need.Very cozy to stay.And  Steve can respond to your questions very quickly,he is very helpful.
很不错的地方,推荐大家去,比较干净,离地铁也不远,个人认为从太子A口出比较好找｡而且房东很好讲话,给出的指示也比较明确｡下次去香港还会去这家的｡

第一次自己一个人旅行,感觉很好,体验很棒｡首先必须给Steve赞一个,虽然没有见到他本人,但一直有联系,有问必答,也让朋友过来解决一些不懂的问题｡第二,房间很干净床很舒服室友很nice,空间虽小(香港是个寸土寸金的地方啊)但物品齐全冰箱也有｡第三,地点不错,很安静,距离旺角也就一个地铁站,附近例如像麦当劳,711都有,但是没有发现可以购物的商场,我主要逛景点没有时间在附近转转｡从地铁出来十分钟内就可以走到｡第四,刚开始的时候已经买了很多东西很重,然后要去找位置花了一些时间,不过好刺激好兴奋,尤其是拿到钥匙的时候太有成就感了｡最后就是安全的问题,本人女,所以没去之前就很担心会不会有类似劫财劫色之类的事情但是房主很有耐心地和我聊,而且附近也很安全｡下次一定会再住这里｡

I landed in Hong Kong a day early unexpectedly due to some visa confusion so I had to book a place for a night and Steve was very helpful and swift with getting back to my request and questions. 

The listing is very accurate: 0.5 bathroom, very little space in general. so no one should be complaining if they've booked this place after reading that. 

However, my experience here was very unpleasant due to the other guest with whom I was sharing the dorm. She didn't speak English well, but that was not a big deal at first. I woke up the next day to our door knocking so I opened it and it's a dude, apparently the boyfriend of the other guest. He walked in with food and the two were eating on the bed and talking. After their meal, they started cuddling. Initially I didn't really care, but as I needed to get ready, clean up and check out, things were getting a little annoying and uncomfortable. As mentioned above, the bathroom is really REALLY tiny; you can't take a shower and get dressed in there because there's absolutely no space for that. I somehow managed to take shower and get dressed in and outside of the 0.5 bathroom with extreme discomfort and difficulty. It's 15 minutes before my check-out time so I tell the other guest that I'll be back to grab something to eat and drink real quick and that I'll be back in 10 minutes. She says "okay see you." I come back after 10 minutes and they are having sex. It's just really rude that she was using this "FEMALE DORM" as her private hotel room. 

Although Steve was very very helpful and understanding, I think there's still room for improvement in managing the space more efficiently and considerably.

This was a great space. The host was really friendly and responsive. When I locked myself out, he came right away to help out. The place is located in a great local area--not touristy at all--with wholesale fabric and clothing markets and shops all around. It's also a quick walk to City University (20 min). I fell in love with The Sparrow Room and will miss it!

Check in was straight forward, Steve came to welcome me and help me settle in. Room was clean, facilities were basic, location was within walking distance of an MTR. Room felt secure, sliding gate and main door. Small living space as advertised, fine for a single traveler on a budget, would book again under the same circumstances, no complaints.
Small but complete in every detail

This cozy studio is conveniently located for your Hong Kong trip. Host is very good with communication, answering several texts and calls throughout the week and right when I arrived. Directions he provides are streamlined and accurate. 
Amenities such as kitchen appliances, drawers, makeshift hangers, extra sheets, etc. are included and stored/located economically within the small space.   
Located a block off main road and several blocks from markets or mtr so nightly noise is kept to a minimum. I was there for 5 nights and had no trouble with neighbors, they were nice and respectful. 
Couldn't recommend sparrow room enough for your stay in Hong Kong.

This a neat place, which definitely falls into the "not for everyone" category.
Pluses: the apartment itself is clean. It's not *that* small, certainly not by Hong Kong standards. It's got nice colors and a certain charm. And the apartment is very well thought out; lots of things you'd need (laundry line, hot pot, etc) and very little that you don't need. And the Sham Shui Po area is hopping. It's got a very "old Hong Kong" feel. HK as a whole has gotten rich, and kinda soft; this feels like the old HK where people are still really hustling to improve their lives. 
Minuses:
First, the bed/mattress was super hard. OMG it was hard. I've slept on carpeted floors that were softer. A new mattress will make this place much better. Second, while the apartment itself is very clean, the building is dirty. 
Finally, I'd say the Sham Shui Po area is also not for everyone. I really liked staying there, but I'm a city guy and I know how to take care of myself. HK as a whole is super safe, and can feel kind of sanitized at times. This neighborhood still has an edge to it - which I liked, but again, not for everyone.

This is a good apartment as long as you know that there are good and bad points. The good points: it's only a few blocks from a major subway/metro line. The neighborhood has a lot of character. It's definitely one of the poorer parts of the city, but still very safe. I enjoyed living here. As far as the downsides, the apartment is very small and a little dark, it's a walk-up (good exercise!), the building is very old (and it shows) but the room is nice. The wifi signal is good (however sometimes in the evening it was very very slow). Check in is very easy and Steve was easy to reach by text.  Overall a good experience for a budget traveler.

First of all, the location is so good. It's only less than 10 minutes to go to "Prince Edward" or "Shum Shui Po" from the hotel so can go to the central for almost 30 minutes. However, the building was old traditional one so there are cockroaches in hotel so don't reccommend to those who hate them. Actually, when I arrived at the hotel, I had felt so scary but after one month, I didn't feel so. In last, the host was helpful and gave me quick response and helping. If you would like to stay house with cheap price, reccommend his hotel.
Steve is an awesome and very kind and attentive host. I would recommend his place to my friends anytime they want a local and friendly feel on their travels.

"Sparrow Room" is an awesome little studio where I enjoyed my stay for three months during my internship in Hong Kong. Steve is an outstanding host, easy-going but also responsible. The apartment is not small by HK standard, it's a normal size studio for one person. Can be okay for two people for a short stay. It has everything you need, most importantly a good washing machine and dehumidifier - two things essential for Hong Kong! I've experienced no problems with electricity or water heater, Aircon also works as should. Some things like toilet and crane were recently repaired and are pleasure to use.
The area (SSP) is amazing. It's the area where working class people and migrants settle, thus it is cheap, resourceful and any conversation on the street brings you genuine knowledge of HK culture. A true immersion if you wanted that kind of experience. Check-in and checkout were extremely straightforward and fast. 
Among minuses, the shower room is small. It was okay for me though. Dehumidifier helped a lot if apartment get humid. 
I totally recommend the host and the place.

name: Stylish Gramercy Park Duplex LOFT
summary: This Modern beautiful duplex loft is  located in a private and coveted boutique condominium in the prestigious and centrally located Gramercy Park neighborhood. Situated on a quiet three filled block, this beautifully decorated open plan duplex has a newly decorated granite kitchen and bathroom.  The double height living room
description: This Modern beautiful duplex loft is  located in a private and coveted boutique condominium in the prestigious and centrally located Gramercy Park neighborhood. Situated on a quiet three filled block, this beautifully decorated open plan duplex has a newly decorated granite kitchen and bathroom.  The double height living room Most major subway lines are just a 7 minute walk from the apartment. Union square: 7 minute walk The park, the gramercy hotel, and Irving street are just a couple of blocks away. Plenty of great parks, cafes, restaurants, and bars surround the apartment. Ultra fast WiFi and cable are available in the unit Bathroom, desk and seating area, Queen size bed, and small changing area are located upstairs on the second floor.
notes: Ultra fast WiFi and cable are available in the unit Bathroom, desk and seating area, Queen size bed, and small changing area are located upstairs on the second floor.
